channel.title: Flying Dragon Shield!
channel.description:
Ok so my server told me so make this so meh here it is didnt work to hard on it... only took me an hour or so SO here it is ill add an ingame pic later... So here... Tell me what i can do better and ill make a v2.
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/DragonSheild.png[/img]
Thanks, Buddy
Credits::
ME 50%
Jagex.. 30%
Silent Cj 20%

item.title: Flying Dragon Shield!
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

CJ, its just that these guys think that he got the dragon symbol of an kiteshield of yours.
Which can’t be true because you never EVER released a dragon kite
Stop the Arguement CJ didnt make the symbol
Buddy didn’t make the model
Someone lock this.
End of it.

-ACF

Read full topic

item.title: Flying Dragon Shield!
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Zillionair1, post:13, topic:268446”][quote author=Buddy_budster link=topic=354275.msg2717912#msg2717912 date=1237756252]

You didn’t make this.

  1. Wings: From the wing shield only recolored.

  2. The Dragon from a runescape model

  3. The octagon: I’ll give you that, but its a primitive.

  1. Wtf is a wing sheild!!! How can i copy if i dont know what it is…

  2. i said i used a vampires wings… And edited them alot!!!

  3. The dragon emblem was not from a runescaoe model it was from silent cj’s dragon kitesheild he made… Duh!!

  4. yes its a primative but its a good base for a sheild… then i created faces on both sides of it… so it works ingame… So dont post if you dont know what your talking about…
    [/quote]Last time I checked, recoloring was not very advanced editing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2009, 07:17:08 pm[/size][hr]Credits::

BuddyBuster 0%

Jagex 50%

Silent Cj 50%

This seems to fit it good enough =) You cant give yourself 50% credits for leeching and adding only primitives.[/quote]

Someone please tell me where i come into this?
None of this model is mine, most is JaGeX’s, and there is a primitive octagon in the middle, end of.

Read full topic

item.title: Flying Dragon Shield!
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

landonsnow1:

looks like some npc’s shield and dragon wings repainted. 6/10

lol not even close I used the primative to create a octagon then made 2 sides in the octagon “thats the shield” Then used a vampires wings… Edited em a bit recoulered then to finish em off i put a dragon emblem in the middel off the octagon then put it all together…
